import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import productview from './productview.css' import Header from './Header' import Footer from './Footer' import chart from '../chart.jpg' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { baseUrl } from './baseUrl' function ProductView() { useEffect(()=>{getLahangadata(); window.scrollTo(0,0)},[]) const navigate = useNavigate() const list = localStorage.getItem("productdata") const [data, setData] = useState(JSON.parse(list)) const [size, setSize] = useState("XS") const [ sizecolor , setSizecolor ] = useState(false) const [ sizecolor1, setSizecolor1] = useState(false) const [ sizecolor2, setSizecolor2] = useState(false) const [ sizecolor3, setSizecolor3] = useState(false) const [ sizecolor4, setSizecolor4] = useState(false) const[showChart, setShowChart] = useState(false) const[ lahangaData, setLahangaData ] = useState([]) const userEmail=localStorage.getItem("userEmail") const postCartData = () => { const items ={ title:data.name, brand:data.brand, quantity:1, thumbnailImage:data.image, price:data.price, size:size, email:userEmail } axios.post(baseUrl+"cart", item).then(()=>navigate("/Cart")) } const getLahangadata=()=>{ axios.get(baseUrl+"product").then((res)=>setLahangaData(res.data.data)) } return (
{JSON.stringify(data)} {userEmail}

setSizecolor(false)&setSizecolor1(false)&setSizecolor2(true)&setSizecolor3(false)&setSizecolor4(false)& setSize("M")} style={{width:30, height:30, border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",background:sizecolor2?"linear-gradient(45deg,#BE9130, #e4c65b, #BE9130)":null}}>M
